Geneo is an interactive and affordable new age blended learning platform. Schoolnet India's flagship Personalized Learning Solution, it has been designed to make learning simple, smart, and effective.


Geneo works as an online learning app for classes 5 to 10 offering curated study content for Science, Maths, English and Social Science. The primary aim of this learning solution is to make school curriculum easier to grasp for students and help them create stronger learning foundations. It facilitates a deeper understanding of concepts and their application to everyday schooling, making learning more effective and complete.


The Geneo Advantage

-Makes learning more enriching and enjoyable
-Compliments information with curriculum followed at school
-Promotes in-depth and thorough understanding of subjects
-Offers deep learning pedagogy with cutting edge technology


Offerings

-Personalized Learning
-School Curriculum Mapped & Curated Learning Content
-Anywhere & Anytime Learning
-Practice & Self-Assessment


Features:

-Live Classes
Free Online teacher-led classes to aid revision and problem solving
-Question Papers
Sample papers for class 6 to 10 and CBSE Question papers to prepare for Board Exams
-Digitized Textbooks
Latest NCERT textbooks in a digital format for easy access
-AI Enabled Guided Learning Assistant
Artificial intelligence based technology to create a personalized learning path
-Talking Assistant
A “ReadToMe” function to help students learn English in an interactive manner
-Expert Mentor Support
Subject experts for clarifying doubts and guidance for better learning
-Exploriments
Patented digital learning laboratories to enable students to perform virtual experiments
-Learning Videos
Animated and teacher-led videos explaining important fundamentals and concepts


Geneo can be accessed on an array of digital devices like PCs, mobile phones and tablets and offers educational content in a personalized, self-paced learning environment to help students study anytime, anywhere and at their own pace.

This smart learning app is based on a blended model of learning. It has been designed around a central idea of helping students complement their conventional classroom schooling, with innovative technology-led tools and resources together with personalized mentor support, to enable holistic and application-based learning. This is what makes it really effective.

For increased credibility and to ensure being in tune with latest global trends, Geneo has partnered with some of the best names in the field of education like Google for Education, Avanti, Khan Academy & English Helper.

Learning content in Geneo is mapped chapter wise and subject wise to CBSE curriculum based NCERT books. This ensures that students learn in unison with what they study at school.

Geneo offers study material for the following grades and subjects -

Science (Class 6, Class 7, Class 8, Class 9, Class 10)
Maths (Class 6, Class 7, Class 8, Class 9, Class 10)
English (Class 6, Class 7, Class 8, Class 9, Class 10)
Geography (Class 6, Class 7, Class 8, Class 9, Class 10)
History (Class 6, Class 7, Class 8, Class 9, Class 10)
Social & Political Life (Class 6, Class 7, Class 8)
Economics (Class 9, Class 10)
Political Science (Class 9, Class 10)
